A

AbstractFrameworkLauncher<T extends OsgiFrameworkListener> - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.osgi.launcher.api
Abstract implementation of the FrameworkLauncher interface, which caters for registering and deregistering EventConsumers (in the form of OsgiFrameworkListener instances) to OSGi ServiceEvents.

Creates a new AbstractFrameworkLauncher and assigns the provided cluster-unique ID to this instance.
